text: aur hamane insaan ko apane maan baap se achchha barataav karane ka hukm diya hai aur (ye bhee ki) agar tujhe tere maan baap is baat par majaboor karen ki aisee cheez ko mera shareek bana jin (ke shareek hone) ka mujhe ilm tak nahin to unaka kahana na maanana tum sabako (aakhir ek din) meree taraph laut kar aana hai mai jo kuchh tum log (duniya mein) karate the bata doonga
